bat.description: Pro Grade Ash -Guaranteed -3 weight differential -15/16" tapered handle -Cupped end WOOD BAT POLICY: WOOD BATS CARRY NO WARRANTY OR IMPLIED GUARANTEE AGAINST BREAKAGE.
Louisville Slugger's adult wood bats are pulled from their original production line for some minor flaw that will not affect the bat's performance.
The Marucci LINDY12 Pro Model is the ultimate contact hitter's wood bat. Inspired by Marucci partner Francisco Lindor.

The SAM BAT PS2 boasts their thinnest handle that flares moderately to the knob to give players a firm grip. The distinctive regular barrel has a long taper through the handle, which helps to extend the sweet spot.
Professionally inspired by Marucci® Player Advisory Board Member, Albert Pujols, for the youth baseball player, the AP5 Pro Model Bat is bone-rubbed for maximum wood density and durability.
Barrel: 2 1/2" - Handle: 31/32" - Length: 34" - Level: Adult - Spec: Center line on end of barrel is blank, ideal for signatures.
